name: Testimonial Feed
author: Lance Meman

sections.description:
This plugin will show a testimonial feed with star rating on your post, page or widget area using the shortcode [tfeed_output].

Parameter:
count: limit the number of feeds to show. (default: 4)
Usage: [tfeed_output count=2]

I am planning to add pagination and front-end testimonial rating submissions in the next updates.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Testimonial Feed”
  3. Activate “Testimonial Feed”
  4. Add Testimonials on “Testimonial feeds” post type
  5. Use [tfeed_output] shortcode in your post or page.
sections.faq:
Will this plugin work on my website/theme
– It will work on any website/theme that follows the WordPress coding standards found at https://codex.wordpress.org. The plugin uses minimal css so you can customize it to match the look and feel of your website.
